request.description:
### Update Marker Execution

This endpoint allows you to update marker execution using an HTTP POST request.

#### Request Body

The request should include a form-data body with the following parameter:

- repositories_to_marker (file): This parameter represents the file to be used for the repositories marker execution.
    

#### Response

Upon successful execution, the response will have a status code of 200 and a content type of text/xml.
